definition: A structure specifically designed and constructed to accommodate various administrative activities, typically housing offices, meeting rooms, and other facilities necessary for conducting business operations. It is commonly utilized as a workplace or headquarters for organizations, corporations, or government entities.

examples.german: Das Bürogebäude steht in der Innenstadt.
examples.english: The office building is located in the city center.
Our company has multiple office buildings.

examples.german: Das neue Bürogebäude wird nächstes Jahr fertiggestellt sein.
examples.english: The new office building will be completed next year.

examples.german: Das Bürogebäude verfügt über moderne Technologie.
examples.english: The office building is equipped with modern technology.

examples.german: Das Bürogebäude bietet eine schöne Aussicht auf die Stadt.
examples.english: The office building offers a beautiful view of the city.
